name: Taj Palace, New Delhi
shortDescription: Experience grand hospitality at Taj Palace New Delhi, an iconic hotel with 403 rooms, stunning gardens, and multiple ballrooms offering legendary Taj service for magnificent Delhi celebrations.
longDescription:
Taj Palace New Delhi has defined grand hospitality in the capital for decades, providing families with a venue that combines substantial scale with the warmth and attention that characterizes Taj Hotels. With 403 rooms and suites, extensive landscaped gardens, and multiple ballroom configurations, this property accommodates the largest celebrations while maintaining the service excellence expected of India's most trusted hospitality brand.

The hotel's architecture balances grandeur with elegance, featuring spacious public areas, curated art collections, and thoughtfully designed venues. The gardens, spreading across acres of manicured lawns, provide outdoor celebration spaces rare in urban Delhi. Multiple dining venues including Orient Express, Blue Ginger, and House of Ming offer diverse culinary experiences.
metaTitle: Taj Palace Delhi Wedding | Grand Garden Wedding Venue 1200 Guests
metaDescription: Host your grand wedding at Taj Palace Delhi. Expansive gardens, multiple ballrooms, 403 rooms, and legendary Taj service for celebrations up to 1200 guests.
address: 2, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi 110021, India
